# A-GH-NoiseGuard Technical Logic Specification

## 1. System Overview

A-GH-NoiseGuard is an automated noise detection and suppression system for GitHub Actions workflows, designed to filter signal from noise in CI/CD telemetry streams.

---

## 2. Core Logic Functions

### 2.1 Noise Classification Algorithm

```
NoiseScore(event) = Σ(wᵢ × fᵢ(event)) / Σ(wᵢ)

Where:
  f₁(event) = frequency_deviation_ratio     | w₁ = 0.25
  f₂(event) = temporal_clustering_factor    | w₂ = 0.20
  f₃(event) = semantic_entropy_score        | w₃ = 0.30
  f₄(event) = historical_false_positive_rate| w₄ = 0.15
  f₅(event) = cross_correlation_coefficient | w₅ = 0.10

Classification:
  NoiseScore < 0.3  → SIGNAL (actionable)
  NoiseScore ∈ [0.3, 0.7) → AMBIGUOUS (queue for review)
  NoiseScore ≥ 0.7  → NOISE (suppress)
```

### 2.2 Frequency Deviation Ratio

```
f₁(event) = |observed_freq - baseline_freq| / (baseline_freq + ε)

Where:
  ε = 1e-6 (smoothing constant)
  baseline_freq = EMA(event_type, window=168h, α=0.1)
```

### 2.3 Temporal Clustering Factor

```
f₂(event) = 1 - (inter_arrival_variance / expected_variance)

Clamped to [0, 1]
Burst detection threshold: CV > 2.5 (coefficient of variation)
```

### 2.4 Semantic Entropy Score

```
f₃(event) = H(message_tokens) / log₂(|vocabulary|)

H(X) = -Σ p(xᵢ) × log₂(p(xᵢ))

High entropy (>0.8) indicates noise (random/generated content)
Low entropy (<0.3) indicates signal (structured/meaningful)
```

---

## 3. Breakdown Point Score (BPS) Matrix

### 3.1 BPS Calculation Formula

```
BPS(component) = (Impact × Probability × Detectability⁻¹) / Recovery_Factor

Scale: 0-100
  0-25:   LOW RISK
  26-50:  MODERATE RISK
  51-75:  HIGH RISK
  76-100: CRITICAL RISK
```

### 3.2 Operational Failure Risk Matrix

| Component | Impact (1-10) | Probability (0-1) | Detectability (1-10) | Recovery Factor (1-5) | BPS | Risk Level |
|-----------|---------------|-------------------|----------------------|-----------------------|-----|------------|
| Event Ingestion Pipeline | 9 | 0.15 | 8 | 3 | 5.6 | LOW |
| Noise Classification Engine | 8 | 0.25 | 6 | 2 | 16.7 | LOW |
| State Store (Redis) | 10 | 0.10 | 9 | 4 | 2.8 | LOW |
| Webhook Receiver | 7 | 0.20 | 7 | 3 | 6.7 | LOW |
| Rate Limiter | 6 | 0.30 | 5 | 4 | 9.0 | LOW |
| Alert Dispatcher | 9 | 0.12 | 4 | 2 | 13.5 | LOW |
| ML Model Inference | 7 | 0.35 | 3 | 3 | 27.2 | MODERATE |
| Configuration Sync | 5 | 0.40 | 6 | 4 | 8.3 | LOW |
| Metrics Exporter | 4 | 0.20 | 8 | 5 | 2.0 | LOW |
| Circuit Breaker Logic | 8 | 0.08 | 2 | 1 | 32.0 | MODERATE |
| Token Refresh Service | 9 | 0.18 | 7 | 2 | 11.6 | LOW |
| Dead Letter Queue | 6 | 0.05 | 9 | 5 | 0.7 | LOW |

### 3.3 Cascading Failure Propagation Model

```
CascadeBPS(origin) = BPS(origin) × Π(1 + dependency_weight × BPS(dep))

Dependency Graph:
  Webhook Receiver → Event Ingestion → Classification Engine → Alert Dispatcher
       ↓                    ↓                   ↓
  Rate Limiter         State Store         ML Inference
```

## 4. JSON Schema for Input Validation

```json
{
  "$schema": "https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema",
  "$id": "https://noiseguard.internal/schemas/v1/event.json",
  "title": "A-GH-NoiseGuard Event Schema",
  "type": "object",
  "required": ["event_id", "timestamp", "source", "event_type", "payload"],
  "additionalProperties": false,
  "properties": {
    "event_id": {
      "type": "string",
      "format": "uuid",
      "description": "Unique event identifier (UUIDv4)"
    },
    "timestamp": {
      "type": "string",
      "format": "date-time",
      "description": "ISO 8601 timestamp with timezone"
    },
    "source": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": ["repository", "organization", "installation_id"],
      "properties": {
        "repository": {
          "type": "string",
          "pattern": "^[a-zA-Z0-9._-]+/[a-zA-Z0-9._-]+$",
          "maxLength": 256
        },
        "organization": {
          "type": "string",
          "pattern": "^[a-zA-Z0-9-]+$",
          "maxLength": 39
        },
        "installation_id": {
          "type": "integer",
          "minimum": 1,
          "maximum": 9223372036854775807
        },
        "actor": {
          "type": "string",
          "pattern": "^[a-zA-Z0-9-]+$",
          "maxLength": 39
        }
      }
    },
    "event_type": {
      "type": "string",
      "enum": [
        "workflow_run",
        "workflow_job",
        "check_run",
        "check_suite",
        "deployment",
        "deployment_status",
        "push",
        "pull_request",
        "issue_comment",
        "status"
      ]
    },
    "payload": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": ["action", "data"],
      "properties": {
        "action": {
          "type": "string",
          "enum": ["created", "completed", "requested", "in_progress", "queued", "waiting", "pending", "failure", "success", "cancelled", "skipped", "stale", "timed_out"]
        },
        "data": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "workflow_name": {
              "type": "string",
              "maxLength": 512
            },
            "job_name": {
              "type": "string",
              "maxLength": 512
            },
            "run_id": {
              "type": "integer",
              "minimum": 1
            },
            "run_attempt": {
              "type": "integer",
              "minimum": 1,
              "maximum": 100
            },
            "conclusion": {
              "type": ["string", "null"],
              "enum": ["success", "failure", "cancelled", "skipped", "timed_out", "action_required", "neutral", "stale", null]
            },
            "duration_ms": {
              "type": "integer",
              "minimum": 0,
              "maximum": 86400000
            },
            "labels": {
              "type": "array",
              "items": {
                "type": "string",
                "maxLength": 128
              },
              "maxItems": 50,
              "uniqueItems": true
            }
          }
        },
        "raw_message": {
          "type": "string",
          "maxLength": 65536
        }
      }
    },
    "metadata": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "delivery_id": {
          "type": "string",
          "format": "uuid"
        },
        "signature": {
          "type": "string",
          "pattern": "^sha256=[a-f0-9]{64}$"
        },
        "retry_count": {
          "type": "integer",
          "minimum": 0,
          "maximum": 10
        },
        "ingestion_timestamp": {
          "type": "string",
          "format": "date-time"
        }
      }
    },
    "classification": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "noise_score": {
          "type": "number",
          "minimum": 0,
          "maximum": 1
        },
        "classification": {
          "type": "string",
          "enum": ["SIGNAL", "AMBIGUOUS", "NOISE"]
        },
        "confidence": {
          "type": "number",
          "minimum": 0,
          "maximum": 1
        },
        "features": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "f1_frequency_deviation": { "type": "number" },
            "f2_temporal_clustering": { "type": "number" },
            "f3_semantic_entropy": { "type": "number" },
            "f4_historical_fpr": { "type": "number" },
            "f5_cross_correlation": { "type": "number" }
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

## 5. SRE Metrics Specification

### 5.1 Service Level Indicators (SLIs)

| Metric Name | Type | Formula | Target |
|-------------|------|---------|--------|
| `noiseguard_availability` | Gauge | `(total_time - downtime) / total_time` | ≥ 99.9% |
| `noiseguard_latency_p50_ms` | Histogram | `percentile(processing_time, 0.50)` | ≤ 50ms |
| `noiseguard_latency_p99_ms` | Histogram | `percentile(processing_time, 0.99)` | ≤ 500ms |
| `noiseguard_classification_accuracy` | Gauge | `correct_classifications / total_classifications` | ≥ 95% |
| `noiseguard_false_positive_rate` | Gauge | `false_positives / (false_positives + true_negatives)` | ≤ 2% |
| `noiseguard_false_negative_rate` | Gauge | `false_negatives / (false_negatives + true_positives)` | ≤ 5% |
| `noiseguard_throughput_eps` | Counter | `events_processed / time_window_seconds` | ≥ 10,000 |
| `noiseguard_error_rate` | Gauge | `failed_events / total_events` | ≤ 0.1% |

### 5.2 Service Level Objectives (SLOs)

```yaml
slos:
  - name: "Event Processing Availability"
    sli: noiseguard_availability
    target: 0.999
    window: 30d
    burn_rate_alerts:
      - severity: critical
        short_window: 5m
        long_window: 1h
        burn_rate: 14.4
      - severity: warning
        short_window: 30m
        long_window: 6h
        burn_rate: 6.0

  - name: "Classification Latency"
    sli: noiseguard_latency_p99_ms
    target: 500
    window: 7d
    error_budget_consumption_rate: 0.1

  - name: "Noise Detection Precision"
    sli: noiseguard_classification_accuracy
    target: 0.95
    window: 7d
    minimum_sample_size: 10000
```
